serviceConnections.title: Connected services
serviceConnections.explanation: You have linked the following services to your account. You may use several services in the City of Helsinki as well as certain third-party services for the same profile.

profileInformation.title: My information
profileInformation.visibility: The following information about you is stored in the service
profileInformation.name: Name

createProfile.heading: Fill in your details to create a profile
createProfile.helpText: This information is only visible to you

profileForm.terms: I agree to the <0>Terms of Service</0>, and that I may be contacted at the address I provide

validation.email: The value must be an email-address
validation.phoneMin: The number must be at least {{min}} characters long
validation.maxLength: This field can be max {{max}} characters

deleteProfile.title: Do you want to delete you Oma.helsinki account?
deleteProfile.explanation: If desired you can delete all your information, but also means deleting your account. Read more from the guide. By deleting your Helsinki profile you also loose all information saved to connected services and can no longer log in
deleteProfile.accept: I have read <0>guide</0> and understand what deleting my data means.

deleteProfileModal.title: Are you sure you want to delete your Helsinki profile
deleteProfileModal.explanation: By deleting your profile you also loose all the data saved to following services

berthErrors.title: You cannot delete your Helsinki profile because Berth needs your information for billing
berthErrors.explanation: To delete your profile, you must first terminate your berth billing agreement

downloadData.panelTitle: Do you want to download your data?
downloadData.panelText: Download your data to see all the information we have stored about you.
